p: Naemi et al. (2014) have reported anti-trichomonas activity of the plant Rheum ribes L. extracts , which contains quercetin, and derivatives of quercetin like 5-desoxyquercetin, quercetin 3- O-rhamnoside, quercetin 3- O-galactoside, and quercetin 3- O-rutinoside. Aqueous and organic extracts of flowers, leaves, and stem showed in-vitro antitrichomonal activity against T. vaginalis at a 125 μg/mL concentration.
